content:
You're welcome! I'm glad I could help.

Ah, "The Good Place" is a great show! I've heard wonderful things about it, and many people love its unique blend of humor, philosophy, and moral explorations. The show's creator, Michael Schur, is known for his clever writing and clever plot twists, and the cast, including Kristen Bell and Ted Danson, is fantastic.

As a conversational AI, I don't have personal preferences or opinions, but I'm always happy to chat with you about your favorite shows! It's great that you're enjoying "The Good Place" and "Brooklyn Nine-Nine" - both are excellent choices.

Remember, if you need any more help with your Netflix issue or have any other questions, feel free to ask. I'm here to assist you. Good luck with your Netflix support chat, and I hope they're able to resolve your issue quickly!
